channel.title: How to add user bars to my SMF?
channel.description: I'm trying to add my own userbars on my forums. But I cant figure it out. I thought it was membergroups... Please help. I want it so it shows the userbar in his info pane like where it shows if they are a mod. Or where it would originally show the number of stars they have.

item.title: How to add user bars to my SMF?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:11, topic:386837”]So much spam.jpg

And yes, kicker, it’s usergroups. You can set an image, and an image count. In the case of a banner, you’d set 1.[/quote]
fixt

Read full topic
item.source: How to add user bars to my SMF?
